text: Lawrence Adams was an English politician. Lawrence, Larry or Laurence Adams may also refer to: *Lawrence Adams (artist), awarded Logan Medal of the Arts *Lawrence Adams (American football) *Lawrence Adams (runner), see 1989 in athletics *Laurence Adams (footballer) (Laurence Adams, born 1931), English footballer *Larry Adams (jockey), American jockey *Larry Adams, Ohio politician
title: Lawrence Adams (disambiguation)
